botan.cert.x509.pkcs10

PKCS #10

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class PKCS10RequestImpl: botan.cert.x509.x509_obj.X509Object;
PKCS #10 Certificate Request.

const PublicKey subjectPublicKey();
Get the subject public key.

Returns:
subject public key

const Vector!ubyte rawPublicKey();
Get the raw DER encoded public key.

Returns:
the public key of the requestor

const X509DN subjectDn();
Get the subject DN.

Returns:
the name of the requestor

const AlternativeName subjectAltName();
Get the subject alternative name.

Returns:
the alternative names of the requestor

const KeyConstraints constraints();
Get the key constraints for the key associated with this PKCS#10 object.

Returns:
the key constraints (if any)

const Vector!OID exConstraints();
Get the extendend key constraints (if any).

Returns:
the extendend key constraints (if any)

const bool isCA();
Find out whether this is a CA request.

Returns:
true if it is a CA request, false otherwise.

const uint pathLimit();
Return the constraint on the path length defined in the BasicConstraints extension.

Returns:
the desired path limit (if any)

const string challengePassword();
Get the challenge password for this request

Returns:
challenge password for this request

this(DataSource source);
Create a PKCS#10 Request from a data source.

Params:
DataSource source the data source providing the DER encoded request

this(in string input);
Create a PKCS#10 Request from a file.

Params:
string input the name of the file containing the DER or PEM encoded request file

this(ALLOC)(in Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC)* input);
Create a PKCS#10 Request from binary data.

Params:
Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC)* input a containing the DER value
